data.title: How many trophies has West Ham United won? When was the last trophy they won?
data.meta_description: West Ham United may not be the most successful of teams when it comes to trophies, but they are still a club which has been a major part of English fo...
data.text:
West Ham United may not be the most successful of teams when it comes to trophies, but they are still a club which has been a major part of English football history.

The Hammers may have never won the Premier (or First Division), however, they often found success in cup competitions.

In fact West Ham's most recent trophy win came at the end of last season when they beat Fiorentina 2-1 to win the Europa Conference League in Prague.

Here is a list of all the titles that West Ham have won since they were formed in 1895.

How many Championships have West Ham won?

West Ham United have won the Championship twice when it was known as the Second Division.

Years: 1957-58, 1980-81

How many FA Cups have West Ham won?

West Ham United have lifted the historic trophy on three occasions.

Years: 1963-64, 1974-75, 1979-80

How many Community Shields have West Ham won?

West Ham United have won the Community Shield, but in this instance, it was shared between themselves and Liverpool following a 2-2 draw.

Years: 1964-65

How many European trophies have West Ham won?

West Ham have won two European trophies since the club's formation.

Their first European success came during the 1964/65 season when the Hammers beat 1860 Munich 2-0 to claim the European Cup Winners' Cup.

The club's next European success came 58 years later when David Moyes' side overcame Fiorentina to lift the Europa Conference League.
